stories.text: Dear fellow hacker news friends: there must be some feasible technology solutions that help saving lives in school shooting scenarios? For instance, how about using remote controlled drones to distract shooters for a few minutes? A few seconds of delay might save some lives? Look forward to seeing your thoughts here or ping me privately to discuss/brainstorm (hopelab22 at gmail)
stories.title: Call for Tech Action: let's do something to protect schools?
California parents could soon sue for social media addiction

stories.text: Hi HN, I have been unemployed for 4 years, one year voluntary and following caused by illness. What is the best way to cover my lack of employment without discussing the disability that caused it when going for an interview? Looking particularly for mainly entry level jobs. What's the best excuse for the lapse of time not spent working or studying?
